title: My league client is not working.
body: Hello, my League client seems to be malfunctioning, and I've looked over every single thread on the forums, and have found no solutions so far. I've also reinstalled the game numerous times to no avail. I'm desperate in trying to fix this issue, please help me.

replies.body: I'd be happy to help but need more information on the issue.  What do you mean by malfunctioning?  What is happening, what do you see, and are there errors?    Are you on the updated client?  More specifics can help a lot, so let me know!

If you haven't yet, try running it as administrator?
My second answer would be:
-Right click the shortcut on your desktop and press "Open file location" 
-Scroll down until you find "LeagueClient.exe"
-Delete the file.
-Open "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
-Repair the the launch menu.
A message should appear underneath the repair status saying something like:
"Your client will update after the patch has been repaired."
YOU NEED TO CLOSE THE CLIENT ONCE IT IS INSTALLED, AND OPEN IT USING THE SHORTCUT, DO NOT USE THE ADMIN LAUNCHER.

I've already tried this but we're probably having the same issue, when I was trying to open it it would say something like "League of Legends has encountered a problem, please reinstall league alpha client to try again". I reinstalled it and it still wasn't working, it kept doing the same thing. So I did the instructions I just gave you, it seemed to work for my friend but now my client just wont start. But I wish you good luck, and I hope you find your answer.{{item:3073}} I'll just sit here and cry as I try to find mine.
